title: Type-C adapter for audio is not working
content:
My googe Pixel 2 XL phone running Android Version 9. I'm using the original USB - C > 3.5mm cable and it's not working.All was working fine yesterday however this morning nothing All audio going via the phone speakers and not via anything connected via the adapter/3.5mm.
Is there any fix to this? 
If so many people having the same issue at the same time means that it's got to be a software issue right? 
Everyone's adapters/type c ports can't stop working all at once

there are over 150 people on this thread experiencing the same problem an noone seams to be replying.. 
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/1663322?msgid=1663322
